name: Jigsaw Collection
description:
This app contains more than 100 jigsaw puzzles of different sizes suitable for any age, all with accurately shaped pieces in various images.

  • Friendly interface and easy to use.
  • 10 jigsaw dimension from 3x2 - 7x7.
  • 144 free puzzles to solved.
  • suitable for any age

    • A Jigsaw puzzle with high quality images.

    Easy to use, just drag and drop the puzzles in to correct position.

    Solve, and play next puzzle.

    Have fun!
